properties.entry: The program is not allowed to run outside of its prescribed season schedule. {startTime|BOTH} is not in a season in schedule id: {scheduleID}
This program is not allowed to run on {date|BOTH}, which is a holiday.
This program is not allowed to run on {weekday}.
Load group, '{groupName}' would exceed its maximum daily control hours by an estimated {numHours|2} hours.
Load group, '{groupName}' would exceed its maximum monthly control hours by an estimated {numHours|2} hours.
Load group, '{groupName}' would exceed its maximum seasonal control hours by an estimated {numHours|2} hours.
Load group, '{groupName}' would exceed its maximum annual control hours by an estimated {numHours|2} hours.
Load groups might be controlled less than their minimum activate time, which is {numSeconds} seconds.
Load groups might control longer than their maximum activate time, which is {numHours|2} hours.
Load group: {paoName} might violate its minimum restart time, which is {numHours|2} hours.
Load group: {paoName} has reached its maximum daily operations which is {maxDailyOps}.
The program cannot run outside of its prescribed control windows. The proposed start and stop times span different control windows.
The program cannot run outside of its prescribed control windows.

The program cannot run outside of its prescribed control windows. The proposed stop time of {proposedStop|BOTH} is outside the control window that runs from {availableStart|BOTH} to {availableStop|BOTH}.

The program cannot run outside of its prescribed control windows. The proposed start time of {proposedStart|BOTH} is outside the control window that runs from {availableStart|BOTH} to {availableStop|BOTH}.
The proposed start time of {proposedStart|BOTH} is after the stop time of {proposedStop|BOTH}.
Undefined Load Management Constraint Violation.

The program cannot run outside of its prescribed control windows. The proposed start time of {proposedStart|BOTH} is outside the CONTROL AREA control window that runs from {availableStart|BOTH} to {availableStop|BOTH}.

The program cannot run outside of its prescribed control windows. The proposed stop time of {proposedStop|BOTH} is outside the CONTROL AREA control window that runs from {availableStart|BOTH} to {availableStop|BOTH}.

The program cannot run outside of its prescribed control windows. The proposed start time of {proposedStart|BOTH} is outside the CONTROL AREA control window that runs from {availableStart|BOTH} to {availableStop|BOTH}.

The program cannot run outside of its prescribed control windows. The proposed stop time of {proposedStop|BOTH} is outside the CONTROL AREA control window that runs from {availableStart|BOTH} to {availableStop|BOTH}.

The program cannot start at the proposed start time of {proposedStart|BOTH} because that is only {minutesFromNow|2} minutes from now and the program's notification offset (notify active offset) is set to {offsetMinutes|2} minutes.
The program cannot start since its master program, {paoName}, is active.
Gear change does not support extending the stop time. Current stop time: {currentStop} Requested stop time: {proposedStop} You cannot override this constraint error.
New gear id is identical to the current running gear. You cannot override this constraint error.
Latching method currently in use, you cannot change from latching method.
Program state is set to: Stopping. Gear cannot be changed when program is not active. You cannot override this constraint error.
Program state is set to: Inactive. Gear cannot be changed when program is not active. You cannot override this constraint error.
Load group, '{paoName}' maximum daily control hours: {maxHours|2}
Load group, '{paoName}' current daily control hours: {currentHours|2}
Load group, '{paoName}' maximum monthly control hours: {maxHours|2}
Load group, '{paoName}' current monthly control hours: {currentHours|2}
Load group, '{paoName}' maximum seasonal control hours: {maxHour|2s}
Load group, '{paoName}' current seasonal control hours: {currentHours|2}
Load group, '{paoName}' maximum annual control hours: {maxHours|2}
Load group, '{paoName}' current annual control hours: {currentHours|2}
Load group: {paoName} is disabled.
Load group: {paoName} maximum activate violation.
Load group: {paoName} minimum activate violation.
Load group: {paoName} minimum restart violation.
Load group: {paoName} max daily ops violation.
Load group: {paoName} max hours daily violation.
Load group: {paoName} max hours monthly violation.
Load group: {paoName} max hours seasonal violation.
Load group: {paoName} max hours annually violation.
Load group: {paoName} not able to control in control area window.
CA start: {areaStart|BOTH} CA stop: {areaStop|BOTH} duration {duration} adjust: Y
CA start: {areaStart|BOTH} CA stop: {areaStop|BOTH} duration {duration} adjust: N
Load group: {paoName} not in program control window.
Load group: {paoName} not enough control time left in program control window.
Program control window should not span midnight.
